contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox German location |image_photo = |Wappen = Wappen Kirchgandern.png |lat_deg = 51 |lat_min = 23 |lat_sec = 5 |lon_deg = 9 |lon_min = 57 |lon_sec = 43 |Lageplan = Kirchgandern in EIC.svg |Bundesland = Thüringen |Landkreis = Eichsfeld |Verwaltungsgemeinschaft = Hanstein-Rusteberg |Höhe = 205 |Fläche = 4.37 |Einwohner = 626 |Stand = 2006-12-31 |PLZ = 37318 |Vorwahl = 036081 |Kfz = EIC |Gemeindeschlüssel = 16 0 61 057 |Adresse-Verband = Steingraben 49<br />37318 Hohengandern |Website = [http://www.kirchgandern.de/ www.kirchgandern.de] |Bürgermeister = Herwig August |Partei = FDP }} '''Kirchgandern''' is a [[Thuringia]]n municipality in the district of [[Eichsfeld (district)|Eichsfeld]] in Germany, in the [[Verwaltungsgemeinschaft]] Hanstein-Rusteberg. Kirchgandern was first mentioned in documentary in 1118. {{Cities and towns in Eichsfeld (district)}} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Eichsfeld-geo-stub}}
